title: US NDS Roms - not complete
description:
This is the sampling of a larger torrent.

These are all US NDS roms.

Some (those outside of the archives) have been trimmed using TokyoTrim.

I have not tested every rom, though those I have have worked fine.

All are scene rips. Some group names have been edited out - props to them still, w/o 

them none of us would have these great games.

If anyone runs into any problems with a trimmed rom, let me know (preferrably through 

a PM - if the Bay supports it, as i don\&#039;t really check comments).

Happy gaming, fellow Pirates.

Those who are confused by how to play these - educate yourselves. R4 forever, baby.
